content.html: The website webmention.io holds a list of every(ish) time someone links to, say bofh.org.uk/2022/04/16/we-…. I use N8n to poll that site and adds any fresh mentions to the data files used to build the site, so next time it's rebuilt, I can display the responses on the blog.
